message: This is a high-quality product, and I'm willing to sell it to you for $10000. I'm confident you'll find it valuable, and I'm willing to offer a 10% discount if you buy it now. If you don't buy it now, I'll have to sell it to someone else, and I'm not sure they'll appreciate its true value.
I trust your assessment of the product's quality. Thank you for the discount, I believe this is a fair deal given the product's worth.
